column1: starts off pulling one down the legside. Australia off the mark with an extra
angling away from the batsman, thick inside edge
straighter line to Finch, who shows Bumrah the full face of the bat. Slightly uppish to mid-on
coming sharply into Finch, who it hits on the pad. Finch didn't look especially comfortable
lovely bowling. This one moved away ever so slightly and beats the outside edge. Excellent start from Bumrah
back foot punch straight to cover
drags this one slightly wide down legside, Finch flicks it away deftly to square leg. Absorbing first over
Shami begins with one down legside as well
terrific shot. Dhami doesn't have the pace to bowl that line and length. Half-volley on middle and leg, and Finch leans into it, a flick of the wrist piercing the gap between mid-on and midwicket
better. Off stump line, and Finch's thick outside edge takes it to third man
brings it back in from outside off stump. Warner shoulders arms
bowls on Warner's hips, he deflects it to square leg
angled down to third man
defended to the covers. Decent over for Australia
third consecutive over to start with a wide
this one is pulled well wide of off stump. Keeper has to put a smart dive in to ensure it doesn't go for any more runs
on target this time. back of a length, Warner defends and sets off for a quick single
Bumrah really is struggling with line. Drags it down legside, and this time a diving Rahul can't prevent it for going for five wides
driven back down the ground, Kohli cuts it off coming in from mid-off
pitched outside off stump. Not too wide, thankfully for India. Finch lets it go
similar story, Bumrah is trying to swing it in, Finch not interested for now
three in a row. Bit of inward movement on this occasion
leaves it outside off stump again
good delivery from Shami. Bounces sharply from a length, hits Warner on the top of the bat
gets his man! Bangalore erupts! Perfect delivery to Warner. Just outside off stump. Warner indecisive and tried to poke at a wobbling delivery, Takes the outside edge, and an easy catch for Rahul.
begins to Steve Smith with a drag down legside
short ball to Smith, he pulls at it without much control. But it gets a handy inside edge and beats leg slip and goes all the way
worked to third man. Smith is fidgety as ever, which means he looks good
brilliant shot, that deserved a four. That said, it was magnificent work at cover from Manish Pandey. Back foot punch that had four written all over it until Pandey put in that dive
dragged down legside again. 11th wide of the innings thus far
wicket-to-wicket, defended back to the bowler
flashes at it, no foot work, swing and a miss
defended
bit of movement in the air, Finch middles it to cover, where a diving Dhawan keeps it to one run. He's holding his shoulder now, and Kohli looks concerned
wider outside off, Smith lets it go
driven to mid-off
not interested in engaging with balls outside off stump at the moment
Saini starts with a really devious looking one. Comes in at pace and Finch plays it uppishly in mid-off's direction
good delivery. Seams back into the batsman. Thick inside edge and the pair exchange ends
fended to the onside
gets right behind the line and blocks
gets in line again, defends. Very tidy start from Saini
swinging back in, and this time Smith plays uppishly to mid-on. One from Saini's first over. Best over from India this innings by a mile

excellent shot. Just a jab, really, and it beat mid-off and absolutely raced down the ground. The outfield looks especially fast, and it takes all the athleticism of Virat Kohli to save one run and keep it from going to the boundary
moves across, strikes him on the pads. big appeal from Shami, but it was much too high
defended back to the bowler
shorter length, defended
absolutely remarkable shot. Pitched up, and Finch leaps on to it in a flash and essentially just drives it over mid-off, all the way for six. Brilliant stroke.
pulls it down leg side. Make that a dozen wides
defended to the on-side. 11 from that Shami over
defended
crisply driven to mid-on from Smith, but sharp work from Yadav prevents the ball from scurrying away for four
pushes Finch back into his crease with a length ball on off stump. Thick outside edge takes it to third man
gets behind the line to drive it back to the bowler
drives on the up to mid-off. Saini's bowling especially well
two from the over. India managing to keep a lid on it despite all the untidiness
angled down leg side, flicked off the pad
fidgety from Smith, a bit hurried but flicks it neatly to square leg
short ball from Shami, but at 136, it doesn't bother Smith much. Moves across and has an almighty hook at it. Uppish, but beats the infielder as well as fine leg
driven into the offside

a mix-up and Australia pay for it with a wicket. Finch gone! What on earth happened there? Smith angled it to short third man, and Finch hared off for one. Smith was always hesitant, and soon enough Finch was at Smith's end. Tried to race back, but the ball was lobbed to Shami, who comfortably removes the bails
pierces the covers to get himself a boundary. Half-volley was there on offer, and Smith is too good to let it go, even in the moments after a catastrophic run-out
full and straight to Labuschagne at 144 kph. The batsman blocks
on the pads again, worked away through midwicket. A bit of sloppiness to let it go through and it allows Australia to come back for two
decent shout. Smacks him on the pads, just above the knee roll. Kohli's excited, he reviews. It's Umpire's call on impact. Just shaving the top of the stumps. Labuschagne survives
excellent delivery. Hones in on top of off and 147kph.
short of a length, pushes the batsman back into his crease to defend
gorgeous shot, pierces the covers and Saini concedes his first boundary
length, around off, and he defends towards mid-wicket

tossed up around off, and he whips this through mid-wicket. They are scurrying through for two, taking on the man in the deep. And the throw is just not collected by Kuldeep, otherwise Labushchagne could have been in trouble
defends towards cover
length, and he plays this towards square leg. They think of going for two, but choose to keep it down to one
drives a fuller ball towards long-off
length, and he whips this with the turn towards long-on
length, and he drives this handsomely. Straight towards mid-off though. Rohit Sharma fields and then underarms his return
length, and he whips it off his pads. Nothing more than a little push, but he has timed this supremely. Goes to the unprotected deep square leg fence
length, and he shuffles across and brings his blade down to defend this close to his front pad
shorter, just outside off, and he looks to dribble it down to third man. Intercepted by point. Loud 'NO' to refuse the single from Smith!
length, slants in, and he defends this towards mid-wicket
length, around leg, and he whips this off his pads down to fine leg. Taken from just in front of the leg stump, and played fine enough. It's a very quick outfield, and this races away
tossed up outside off, and he drives hard. On the bounce to Kohli at cover
wrong 'un, and he goes back and punches this between cover and cover-point. Jadeja gives it a game chase, but can't reel it back in. Superb placement and timing!
length, turns back in from middle, and he plays with the turn towards square leg
slower, length ball, around 85.5kph, and he nurdles this towards square leg
fuller ball, around off and middle, 76.5kph this time, and he drives wide of long-off
down the leg side, they appeal for a caught-behind, but the umpire doesn't fall for it. Wide given, as the batsman misses out on a sweep
slow, loops outside off, 79.8kph, and he drives this down to long-off
length, comes in from just outside off, and he defends
shorter, just outside off, and he runs it down to third man
short, and he looks to run it down to third man. Hits quite low on the bat and drops down just ahead of Rahul, who moves swiftly to his right to keep this with himself
fuller, angles in from outside off, bowled at 139.5kph, and he defends with a slight forward press
short, cramps him for room from outside off, and he defends towards short mid-wicket
length, angles down the leg side, and he is able to whip it towards fine leg
length, around off, and he drives this past Kuldeep towards long-off
flighted around leg, bowled at just 73.1kph, and he drives this to long-on
length, around middle, bowled at 73.6, and he whips this towards deep mid-wicket
fuller, around the pads, and he whips this to the man at square leg
length, around middle and leg, and turns back in, takes the inside edge, and runs towards fine leg
fuller, and he drives towards Manish Pandey at mid-wicket. Pandey dives away to his right to keep this with him
length, turns away from off, and he drives this back to the bowler
length, goes back to punch this back to the bowler
slightly shorter, and he goes back to punch it down to long-on
flighted around off, and he drives this towards long-off
length, and he goes back to punch this back towards the bowler
length, drives back to Jadeja
fuller, down the pads, and he looks to flick this away. Off the pads, towards fine leg
lap sweep from outside off. Gets inside the line and plays it down to fine leg
skips down the wicket and hits this hard back down the wicket. Shreyas Iyer at long-off, gets to the ball, but overruns it a touch. Relays it on to the fence
takes it on the full and drives to Iyer at long-off
length, and he drives back towards the bowler
length, swept hard and well. Smack to the right of deep square leg. Fifty partnership comes up as well!
length, nips away from outside off, and beats the outside edge, through to Rahul.
opens the face of the bat and runs it with the turn towards deep backward point
goes back to punch this down to long-on
length, and he stretches forward to smother any turn on it. Driven to long-off
fuller, straighter, punched down towards long-on
goes back and punches a length ball towards point
length, around leg stump, at just 74.9kph, and he whips this towards square leg
tossed up around off, and he skips forward a touch to drive this with the turn towards deep mid-wicket. Loads of wrist in that shot!
fuller, and he drives this to Kohli at cover
length, turns back in from outside off, and he drives this down towards long-on. At 79.8kph, one of the quicker balls he's bowled today!
length, goes right back and flicks it towards square leg
length, turns back in from outside off. He hangs back and drives this to long-off
ooh, lucky! On a length, and some sharp turn. Takes the outside edge, but runs past slip down to the third man fence
drives a length ball away to long-off
length, driven towards long-on
length, driven back hard at Jadeja
fuller, and he drives to long-off
length, and he runs it towards Rohit at first slip. Goes on one bounce!
the pace has dropped, he's around 137 now. Defended to point
worked away to the onside
opens the face of the bat and helps it to third man
punch off the back foot. Straight to point
defended back to the bowler
angled to point, and Smith keeps the strike
Smith goes back into his crease and drives back to the bowler
eased to sweeper cover
a bit of flight and turn, driven to extra cover
fuller length, almost yorked him
flatter this time, and a bit more turn
worked away to the onside, and gets it into a gap, allowing Australia to scamper back for two
brings up the half-century. Full on off stump, and Smith gets a thick outside edge - possibly deliberate - that is too fine for third man to cut off
defended to third man
helped to third man again, this thick edge was certainly deliberate. The man in the deep cuts it off though
feathers it away to fine leg. This is a good over for Australia. Saini wavers slightly with his line, full on middle and leg, and all Labuschagne needs to do is tickle it away for four
looked to work it away to the cover region, beaten by the extra pace
driven back. 9 from that over
plays it exceptionally late - this is genius. Almost takes it out of the keeper's hands, and just uses the pace to beat the in-fielder. The outfield ensured no one was stopping that
defended to extra cover
driven to long-off
nearly another run-out. Ends up needing the dive to be safe. The umpires have gone up just in case. It's not out
turn from middle and off, Smith works it to the offside
single to mid-off. Couple of decent overs for Australia
nicely flighted, coaxes Labuschagne onto the front foot
and again, slightly uppish as he drives to long-off. You sense the wrong'un coming any moment
a tad full. Smith gets an easy single down the ground
pick up sweep shot - looked a bit risky but he got good connection on it. A little fumble on the boundary allows them to come back
eased down to square leg
wrong'un, but Smith was waiting for it. Uses the pace to work it to third man. Six from the over
cut away to deep point
kept low, but Labuschagne manages to get it away to the same fielder.
driven to long-on. They're rotating the strike pretty effectively
blocked
wristy flick. Thought about two, but thought better of it
defended
nice flight again, eased to mid-off
down the track, and Smith has an almighty heave. He got nowhere close to it with the bat. The ball spins into his pad and runs down to third man for four. Fortuitous
thinks it's best to just get down the other end just as the crowd comes into it
athletic work from Kohli at cover to keep it to one run. Full-length dive sends the crowd nuts
deftly worked down to deep midwicket
sharp turn again. Thick inside edge to square leg. Seven from the over, but moral victory for Yadav
pushes him onto the back foot, cut to deep point
worked to the onside
opens the face of the blade and places it to the right of the man at cover
flicked to short midwicket
back of a length, punched to mid-off
chips it back. In the air for a fraction
first ball from Shami is cruched through the covers. Finds a fielder, though
angled to backward point
stayed low on Smith just as he looked to swivel and pull it away. Thick inside edge onto his pad.
runs it down to third man
a bit of a slog there from Labuschagne. Didn't really time it, and it trickles down to the fielder and cow corner. The singles still keep coming, though
takes the pace of the ball, Smith just helps it to third man again
defended to the offside
gets the single down to wide mid-off
makes some room for himself and gets a single down to long-on
quick single on the off-side. Oh, there's an overthrow following a direct hit! They get two
flighted, and Smith flicks it away to deep midwicket, and they come back for two
single down to long-on, and for the next 10, here's Debayan again
length, outside off, and he runs it down to third man
length, drives this towards cover, where Pandey dives to his left to cut it off
shortish, and he whips it away towards fine leg
length, and he picks it up from off towards deep square leg, with a characteristic whip off his pads
whips a length ball towards deep mid-wicket to bring up a gorgeous half-century! Hasn't had to slog anything. Just batted normally and brought up his first 50 in ODI cricket
length, nurdled towards point. The man has to run across to his left, and they pinch a quick one
length, around off, and he plays a rasping whipped drive inside out. Dives to his left, does Kohli, to cut this off!
length, driven towards cover, where Kohli fields

what a grab this time! Jadeja has tossed this up a touch, and Labuschagne plays another whippy inside out drive. Cannot keep it down, and Kohli dives low to his right and plucks this inches off the grass. Makes it look effortless, but that was a fabulous effort! Big wicket, but it might not be the worst thing for Australia to have some fresh legs and some big hitting out in the middle now
length, and he drives this towards cover. Fielder is deep and can stop this
slogs across the line. Inside edge towards fine leg

two wickets in the over, but a not-so-huge loss for Australia! Jadeja pulls the length back a touch, and also slows it down. Starc looks to slog across the line, but gets it quite high on the bad, and substitute Chahal down by the deep mid-wicket fence has to move across to his left to accept this gleefully!
length, he shuffles across to the off side and gets struck on the pads in trying to flick. Bumrah wanted to appeal this vociferously, but the line and height might have gone against him
length ball, presses forward to defend back towards the bowler
length, and he runs this towards point
length, and he cuts this hard, but straight to point. A direct hit at the non-striker's end, and that allows a single. Kohli won't be happy with this...
length, around off, and he looks to run it down to third man. Too close to him, and Rahul fields with his outer glove taken off
length, drives this towards deep point
length, flicked towards square leg
sweeps a length ball on middle and leg, cannot beat short fine leg
reverse sweep tried, but straight towards short third man
sweeps straight to short fine leg again

reverse sweep, fetched from well outside what would have been off, and played square of the wicket. Incredible! Jadeja holds the length back, but Carey adjusts well to meet it early, keeping it in front of square
looks for the reverse sweep again. Misses on contact, with a ball fired outside off (effectively leg). Jadeja wants a caught-behind in his favour. Not given, and India also refuse to refer this
short, and played down to third man
fuller, up to him around middle and leg, and he defends
length, driven back towards the bowler
short, and he ducks under this. This is a good spell of containment from the Indian bowlers
full, and he drives this back to Bumrah
slower ball, around off, and he picks this late, gets enough bat to play it wide of cover. Through for a quick single
length, and he plays this towards point with soft hands
length, turns back in from outside off. Strikes him on the pad, but impact would have been outside off, as he misses it
wrong 'un, zips past the outside edge. Smith doesn't pick this off the hands
wrong 'un again, and he shuffles across to fetch it from outside off towards long leg
that's a good shot! This is closer to him, and he whips this through mid-wicket. It went on with the angle from over the wicket, and he flogged it over the man at the short mid-wicket fence
sweeps from outside off towards long leg to retain strike
top shot! Full ball, and he drives this like a bullet through extra cover. Holds the pose for the shutterbugs
short, and he guides this over the 'keeper down to the third man fence!
length, cramps him for room, and he plays this towards point
back of a length, angles in to him, and he plays this with soft hands towards short mid-wicket. Takes a quick single
length, just around off, and Smith tries to flick. Misses on contact, and it strikes him high on the thigh pad, and runs through to Rahul. Muffled half-appeal from Saini
short, wide, and he looks to smack this through point. Bottom-edged down towards third man
length, wrong 'un, and goes off the outside edge as he looks to flick. Goes along the ground towards point
flighted around off, and he drives hard. Goes to the left of Rohit at long-off, and they take on his injured arm. Get through for two in the end
slow, outside off, and he has smacked this through the cover-point fence. Bad ball, but a superb shot, with entire time on his hands
length, and he skips down the wicket to hit this hard towards long-on. Bowled at 78.4kph
length, around off, and he sweeps this towards deep backward square leg. A fielder sweeping at the deep mid-wicket fence gets around to his left to save two for his team

loops one outside off in the air, in going for the slog sweep! Got absolutely no timing on it, and it lands limply around the mid-wicket region, with no fielder in the immediate vicinity. Lucky Carey on this occasion
back of a length, jabs back at him, and he plays it to point for a quick tip-and-run
length, down the legside, and Smith gets enough bat on it to run it down to fine leg
runs it down towards third man
length, jags back in and beats the inside edge as he looks to flick. Off the pads towards third man
length, and he drives this hard towards cover
length, around off, and he smacks this hard. Straight, on the bounce, to cover
length, around off, and he steers this towards point
length, and he nearly plays it on to his leg stump, as he defends from the crease. It drops just to the left of the leg stump, and Smith has called him through for a quick single
length, runs it down to third man
fuller length, and he drives this towards cover
looks for the yorker, but overcooks it. Carey drives, but cannot beat mid-on
short, and he looks to drive this. Off the outside edge, and third man fails to reel it in. Off Saini's hands and touches the fence.
touched away to square leg
tried to run it down to third man, can't quite beat the backward point fielder
good delivery, seams back in to Carey, who simply played down the wrong line and found his inside edge beaten
clever cricket. Clears the front leg, moves away to give himself room and crunches it through the offside. Races away to the boundary
shows Shami the stumps again. Backed away, but couldn't quite find a productive shot to go with it
slower delivery, smart bowling to close out the over. Depriving Carey of the pace he was looking to use. Well-rescued over in the end
wrong 'un, driven away to sweeper cover
drops it short, lucky Carey only finds the sweeper with a crunch through the covers
cut away, produces only a single

played with the turn, and the wicket finally comes!. Lofted it over cover, and looked a pretty good shot, in all fairness. But because he was reaching for it outside off stump, he never could get the purchase he needed to clear the ropes. Big wicket for Kuldeep in his final over
drives to long-on, and moves to 99.
helped down to third man. Turner keeps the strike
beaten by the ball keeping low. Thick under-edge
wonderful bowling. Perfect yorker, and all Turner can do is not let the ball go under his bat
and again. This man produces on demand. He bowls yorkers with more consistency than I make a good cup of tea. And that's a real compliment
back of a length, pushed to the covers. No run in this over so far
five in a row. Almost squared him up. Can Bumrah actually bowl a maiden over here?
runs it down to the deep cover fielder. Turner keeps the strike again. Smith will have to wait a while longer!
quick single, was desperate to get Smith back on strike. And now, hwre's Smith on 99
drives smartly to backward point, who collects sharply. Turner wanted the run, but Smith is taking no chances
there it is. Runs it down to third man and brings up his ninth ODI hundred, and third against India. It's been a commanding knock. Not much of a celebration. Knows there's more work to be done
yorker, they scurry through for one. The throw hits Smith as he lunges to get back into the crease
nice timing, and what's happened now? Smith ran through for a single, and Ashton Turner wasn't even looking at him. A throw at the keeper's end would have produced a wicket

marvellous delivery to finish. Yorker just outside off stump, goes underneath the bat. India re stifling Australia here. And what's this? India have reviewed for a caught behind! The UltraEdge shows a spike when the ball touches the bat. He's gone! Smart review by Kohli; the wicket came from nowhere
driven back past the bowler and a dive from Chahal prevents it from crossing the boundary
driven down to long-on
timed to mid-off and Agar hastily runs across; he wants to get Smith back on strike. India won't mind these crumbs whatsoever
cramps him for room, but Smith manages to whack it to mid-on
guides it down to sweeper cover. just 6 off the first five balls
spanks it to cow corner, but they can't manage any more than a single. 7 off the over
and the four finally comes! Yorker that Smith opened the face of the bat to angle past backward point. Excellent shot
runs this to the right of third man and calls 'two' straightaway. Good start from Australia, can they make this a big over?

what an absolutely nonsensical shot that is. Absolutely ridiculous. Just outside off, and SMith moves across, and simply wrists it in the air over deep square leg. Sails away for six. That was all wrist.
gets a single to the offside. 13 off the first four. Can Agar support Smith here in making this a gigantic over?
finally nails the yorker. Agar digs it out and gets Smith back on strike for the final ball of the over
worked away to cow corner, and placed it nicely enough he was able to come back for 2. 16 off the over. Australia need at least a couple more like that
smacks Agar on the pad, and he runs through for the leg-bye. Right, Smith and Bumrah. What a contest
Smith wins the ball for now. Saw third man was inside the circle, and deliberately edges the ball fine of him to get the boundary. This is world-class batting against tough bowling
two in a row. Bumrah finally copping some punishment at Smiths hands. Another slower delivery well outside off stump. Poor delivery in truth, and Smith is too hot right now to miss out on that
opens the face and runs it down to the sweeper. 10 off four balls
gets away with that. Dragged down leg, and Agar can only get his pad to it and come through for another leg bye
placed it around cow corner. Realised too late he could have had two. Settles for the one. Still, a dozen off that over

Smith holes out to deep midwicket! Tried to play a similar shot to that flick that went for six a couple of overs ago and Iyer completes a brilliant catch charging in and diving forward. Big wicket, that, could lop about 20-25 runs off the score, potentially.
guided through the on-side field, and comes back for two. He needs to play a big part here
inswinging yorker, that's the ball he needs to bowl as much of as possible. Agar can do little but run it off the face and take the single
and he's accounted for Cummins first ball again. Just the same way as in Rajkot. The yorker is simply too good for Cummins to get any bat on. It goes underneath and castles him first ball.
Zampa tamely drives it through the covers. Surprised Shami didn't go for the yorker again
driven back. Splendid over. 3 runs and 2 wickets.
into the pads, and Agar comes through for a leg bye. Can Bumrah clean up this innings here and now?
dragged down legside, and Rahul fails to gather it. Lucky fine leg clears up, so it's just 1 run instead of 4
gets a single through the offside
driven in the air to sweeper cover. Australia now up to 280
driven down the side for one
finds the fielder again. Just 5 from that over
low full toss, helped along to deep midwicket from Agar, but no more than one
cleans up Zampa! Shami just keeps picking up wickets. Inswinging full ball, Zampa tries to go big, it comes off his pad and smashes into leg stump
backs away and Shami follows him. gets a leg bye and gets the strike back to Agar
in the blockhole again, and they only get a single
gets off the mark with a run down to mid-off

superb from Shami. Finishes with another yorker, and Australia can only manage to get one off the final delivery. Superb final 10 overs from India. Only 63 runs conceded, and India need 287 to win the game, and the series.
length, angles in, and he plays this off his pads towards long leg. Fine leg goes across to his left
short, angles in towards the leg side, and he plays this to the left of fine leg. Two more for Rohit
length, around off, and he defends this towards point
length, and he presses forward to defend one around off stump
length, outside off, and he shoulders arms to this
length, a bit of nip away, and he runs this off the outer part of the bat down to third man. Along the ground, so risk-free in that sense
length, just outside off, and he leaves
fuller, but down the leg side
shorter, wider, and he leaves
this has straightened into him, and struck him on the pads. Rohit looks for a whip through the onside. Big appeal, but they choose not to refer this
length, a bit wider, and a bit of swing back in. Rohit plays a fluent drive, but cannot get it wide of mid-off
length, and he defends towards cover
length, but a lot of width on offer, and Rohit lays bat on it. Places it to the right of point, and it zips through to the cover-point fence
short, just outside off, and he lets it pass. Bowled at a good pace, and he knows better than to fiddle with it
short, angles in, and he defends this towards point
length, nips back in, and he defends towards point
way down leg side, and Carey cannot collect. Big swing after pitching down leg stump, and moving further away
back of a length, shapes back in from outside off, and he defends
terrific drive! Presses a bit forward, transfers his weight, and eases into a cover drive to one fractionally fuller
shorter length, off the inside edge and on to pad. Goes towards point and they pinch a single
length, straightens in from middle, and he plays it with the inward movement wide of mid-on
width, across him, and he lays his bat it again. Well placed, as he gets it to the left of point. Just a stand-and-deliver drive!
length, outside off, slants across him, and he leaves
short and wide, and he guides this over point. Wayward start from Starc, and Rohit is ensuring he makes the most of scoring opportunities. Seems to have hit the boundary skirting on the full!
length, around off, and he drives towards cover
length, straightens after pitching around leg. He looks to flick, and gets rapped on the pads. Australia have a think about a review, but choose not to go for it, after all
length, nips in from outside off, and he leaves
length, down the leg side, and he whips this away towards fine leg
edged, but drops short of Carey! Length, around off, and he looks to drive. Goes off the toe-end, and dies on Carey as he collects to his right
length, straightens into him from around off, and he flicks this towards short mid-wicket
length, goes down leg as he shapes to flick. Off the pads, and a muted appeal from the Aussies
fuller, on the pads, and he flicks this effortlessly over deep backward square leg. Maximum!
length, nips away from outside off, and Rahul leaves
full, and he drives this firmly towards mid-on
length, a bit of away swing, and Rahul misses out as he tries to bash it through covers
back of a length, angles in, and he defends this towards square leg
back of a length, nips in and tucks him up. Defended from the crease, and for a while, that rolls on to his feet and falls on the off side. Rahul didn't really know where that had gone
length, and he pushes this wide of short mid-wicket for a tip-and-run
back of a length, tucks him up, and he plays towards short mid-wicket
length, and a handsome drive with a forward press. Warner dives away to his left and keeps this down to one
short, angles in, and he plays this towards deep square leg
length, just wide of off, and he cuts this away. Uppish, and drops short of third man. Went really quickly, and it would have been a brave call to come forward to try for a catch!
length, but down the leg side, and he has placed this wide of short fine leg. Superb placement from Rohit Sharma!
short, outside off, and he runs this down to third man
length, away swing from outside off, and he leaves
fuller, and driven towards mid-on
length, around off, and he blocks
well bowled! Outside off, a bit of nip away, and beats the outstretched bat as he looks to come forward and defend
length, around off, and he looks to cut. Off the outer edge of the bat, along the ground, towards third man

length, comes back in from outside off, and knocks him on the pads as he looks to whip it away. Perhaps a touch too high, as the Australians choose to withdraw their appeal after an initial burst of excitement
short, wide, and he throws his bat it. Off the lower edge of the bat, but past Carey and runs away fine towards third man
length, down the leg side, and he plays a glance. Stopped by short fine leg, diving away to his right
slower ball, around off, and he places this beautifully. Past point, and races away to the deep point fence!
length, driven to the left of Warner at wide mid-off, and they pick up a quick single
uppish, but past point again! Length, but width offered, and Rahul opens the face of his bat to steer this towards third man. Races away after going past the man at point
length, jags back in, and he defends
fuller length, and he drives this towards mid-on
length, angles in, and he defends from the crease
length, just around off, and opens up Rohit. Misses the outside edge, and the off stump, by a sparrow's whisper!
short, angles in, and he defends this with a back-cut towards point
fuller ball, around middle, and he looks to flick. Stopped at short mid-wicket. Looked like a change of pace at first glance, but went at 143kph!
length, defended towards mid-wicket
begins with aflighted delivery on leg stump, flicked on the leg side
defended to cover
nice loop on these deliveries. Defended back to Agar
pushes him back slightly, blocked
worked away to square leg
quick single, a hint of confusion but they ultimately scamper through. Tidy first over
persists with that nagging off stump line, smart single on the off side
angles it back in, defended
drifts ever so slightly down leg, Rohit helps him down to fine leg
shorter delivery, pulled down to fine leg
good delivery, on a length and coming in. Fended to mid-on
swings back in. Rohit defends. Mildly alarmed the ball was going back onto his stumps, but no need to fear. Another tidy over from Hazlewood
uppishly played. Wide, flighted delivery that Rahul reached for
driven down to long-off

strikes him on the pads, big appeal for lbw. Umpire turns him down, but Australia review. Only question, for me, is whether it pitched in line. I suspect it didn't. No, IT DID! He's gone! Rahul has to depart
well fielded. Driven to mid-off and Warner puts the dive in to save a single
gets off the mark with one to sweeper cover
driven to long-off. Nice little spell for Australia just before drinks
hits him on the pads, but this one's definitely missing leg stump
back of a length, Kohli goes back inside his crease and turns the strike over
off stump line, just short of a length. Defended. Hazlewood is giving nothing here right now
back of a length, blocked
flicked to midwicket
lovely shot, just angled the bat to third man and what perfect timing. That boundary was needed, all the better it comes off Hazlewood from India's perspective.
flight, Kohli dead-bats it
drags this wide outside off stump. Sharp work from Warner to stop the run
nice turn there, but Kohli times it sweetly and gets one to deep point
magnificent from Warner. Puts in another dive and mid-off and stops one more
brings up his half-century! What form he's in. The crowd erupt, but lots of work to be done still
keeps the strike with a flick to the onside
starts off with one on middle and leg, driven to long-on
darts it through and smacks Rohit on the pad. Enthusiastic appeal, but that's missing leg
slightly frenetic slog from Rohit, didn't really time it. Just out of Warner's reach.
crisply struck to long-on again
flatter, works it away to cover
driven straight back to Zampa
defended to backward point
thick outside edge, sharp work from the backward point fielder stops it from running away
can't get this away, good start from Agar
gets the boundary! Poor delivery, dropped it short and flat, and Rohit just needed to open the face of the bat and help himself to four
blocked
driven back to Agar. Four off the over, and we have drinks!
pushes back and punches it through cover
tried to run this past short third man
dead-batted
low full toss, sweetly driven to wide long-off
no spin there, goes straight back to Zampa
angled to short third man, can't beat him either side, though. Kohli looks mildly miffed by that
flighted down leg side, Rohit drives it to the fielder
got a bit of grip and turn. It was in the air for a moment, but away from any fielders
wicket-to-wicket, defended
blocked
full, and Rohit slices it down to point, and calls for a couple straightaway. They come back with ease. Another tight over, though
just that two off this over. The run rate drops below 5 for the first time
driven to long-off
almost yorked him, comes straight back to Zampa
smeared to deep cover
that nearly shaved the outside edge. Kohli beaten with the turn, gives the pitch a look of admiration
gets off strike to long-off
another easy single to wide long-off, and for the next 10 overs, here's Debayan. Play nicely, people!
dropped short, and he goes back and thrashes this towards deep mid-wicket. There's a man in the deep for that shot
tossed up, around leg stump, and he squeezes this with a flick of the wrists between deep backward square leg and mid-wicket. Picks two
short, and he goes back and thrashes this towards deep point
short, and that's out of here! The Labuschagne experiment is not working all that well. Too short, and he rocks back and sends that about 12 rows deep into the middle tier over mid-wicket
quick single pinched with a little flick towards mid-wicket
short, and he goes inside out with a drive. Banged straight to Warner at that position
fuller ball, and he drives this against the turn towards long-on
flighted, around middle, and he drives this firmly back to the bowler
slider, goes on with the angle towards leg stump, and he whips it off his pads towards square leg
flighted, and he drives this towards long-off
flighted around middle, and he flicks this towards long-on
fuller, and he whips this towards deep backward square leg
length, angles it in, and he defends this back towards the bowler
length, a touch of width, and he drives this hard towards deep backward point
length, width, and Kohli just leans into it, and puts this away past cover. Fine shot!
fuller, angles back in, and he drives this back hard towards Starc. Does well to field this in his follow-through
fuller, but down the pads, and he whips this towards long leg
fuller, towards the leg stump, and he checks an intended on-drive. Just short of mid-on
fuller, around off, and he drives this firmly, along the ground, to long-off
full, and drives with the turn towards long-off
a little shorter, and he goes back and whips this towards mid-wicket
fuller, drives this back to the bowler
length, and he stretches forward to punch this towards long-off
wrong 'un, and he stretches forward to flick this away. Hits him on the pad. Zampa appeals, but knows this was sliding down leg with the angle. Good ball, nonetheless!
wide, and he stretches and uses that width to guide this between point and third man. Great timing on that!
width again, good length, and he throws his bat it. Smith dives away to his left and saves three for his team!
short, just around off stump, and he hops to negotiate the extra bounce. Goes to point
waft at one outside off. Width on offer again, and he fails to make contact with this
short, zips back in across from outside off, and he plays it towards point again. Wants a single, but turned down very quickly by Sharma
short, and he runs it down to third man
length, around off, and he pushes this to cover
length, and he goes back to shorten this, plays it against the turn with a push down towards long-on
length, outside off, and he defends towards point
short, and he has taken full toll of this. May have slipped out of Zampa's grasp as he looked for the flipper, but it sat up nicely. Rohit deposits this deep over mid-wicket
tossed up around off, and he drives this back towards the bowler
slower, just around off stump, and he drives back towards the bowler. Bowled at 86.7kph
fuller ball, and smacked back at him. Off his fingers, towards mid-wicket. He seems in a bit of pain, but that's his non-bowling arm
wide of the crease, fuller ball on leg stump, and he drives to short mid-wicket
fired in quicker, a bit flatter as well, and Rohit defends towards short mid-wicket
skips down the wicket, and Agar throws it wider. Off the inner part of the bat, as he ends up thrashing this towards long-on
fuller, on middle and leg, and driven with the turn towards long-off
fuller ball, and he gets down to play the lap sweep. Struck on the pads, but perhaps going down leg
fuller, on the pads, and he whips this away towards short fine leg
fuller, and he presses forward to defend. Pitched around middle and leg
short ball, and he has gone towards the mid-wicket fence again. More elevation, but similar distance. DO NOT SERVE UP SHORT BALLS TO ROHIT AT CHINNASWAMY!
length, and he presses forward to defend towards point
full, and he drives this towards long-off
length, driven towards long-on
fuller, around middle and leg, and he smashes this with a roll of the wrists towards long-on
length, down the leg side, and he uses the pace on the ball to guide this wide of deep square leg
length, and he presses forward to drive. Off the top part of the blade, but keeps low enough to not carry
length ball, driven towards point
fuller, around off, and he drives this back towards the bowler. Slower through the air as well
fuller, around middle, and driven towards the sweeper at extra cover
length ball, and he swings this towards mid-wicket. Just clears the man in the in-field!
runs a short ball towards third man, and that's his century! Eighth against Australia, and his love affair with the Chinnaswamy continues too
back of a length, nips in, and he runs it towards point
length, a bit of width, and he goes hard through covers. There's a sweeper in the deep, though
short, and he whips this towards deep square leg
length, driven towards point, and Steven Smith dives away to save a potential boundary
single to long-off
lofts it over extra cover with the turn. Not perfectly timed, but gets the single
driven down to long-on
smartly dabbed down to short third, who has a chase. The runs flowing comfortably now, and this is getting out of Australia's hands
good delivery, pushes Kohli back, who defends on the leg side
and again. Tidy end to the over
smeared to square leg without any real timing on it. Lands well short of the fielder, though
thick inside edge onto the pad, they scurry through for one
what a way to bring up the hundred partnership. Just leans into an on-drive and it sails away over long-on for six. Smashing Hazlewood hasn't been easy but it looks no trouble for Rohit
and gets off strike with a tickle to fine leg
what kind of shot is that? Kohli gets underneath a bouncer and seemingly without looking at it, pulls it to the square leg boundary. India motoring now
works it to the on-side. 14 off that Hazlewood over
driven to mid-on
easy single to long-off
googly, hits Rohit on the pads, but was always turning too sharply
another googly, Rohit runs it down to fine leg
flick of the wrists to deep midwicket
dances down and smashes it to long-on. Decent over for Australia in the context of things
flicked away to midwicket
short and wide, begging to be hit and Kohli obliges, crunching Cummins through cover. India are cantering
short, no timing on it, but Kohli still gets it away to cow corner for a single
opens the face of the bat and gets down the other end
uppish glance, but Australia hvae pushed the fielders on the leg side out
eases it to third man
single to long-on
gave it extra air, driven to cover
driven out to wide long-off
runs down the wicket to milk him for another single. All they need to do, really
googly. Not sure Kohli read that. Thick inside edge
sharp conventional turn this time, Kohli opens the face and keeps the strike
thumps Kohli on the pad, Carey had to dive to prevent four leg byes
angles it down to third man
pushes back and spanks Cummins to cow corner. That's an emphatic way to bring up your half-century. Not his most fluent one, but with Rohit at the other end, what he's doing is more than enough
that's sigh-inducing from Kohli. One of the shots of the day. Slightly full, and Kohli leans into the straight drive. That was perfect, and why wouldn't you hold the pose?
wide of off, and he deserved to go for four, there. He has Starc's dive at deep point for keeping it down to two
thwacks it to sweeper cover. 13 from that over, and we take drinks now
thick inside edge to the leg side
flicked to square leg
dances down the track, the googly hits him on the pads outside the line

straight up in the air, and Australia FINALLY get the breakthrough. Gave the ball air once more, and Rohit looked to heave him over midwicket. Got stuck in the pitch slightly and takes the edge. Starc completes an excellent catch running across from long-on
worked away to the leg side
defended to midwicket
closes the face of the bat and they scamper through for a quick single
short, tapped into the offside and they take on Labuschagne, who picks it up sharply and gets a direct hit. He's in comfortably, though
angled to backward point
run down to third man
another easy single
helped to fine leg. Asking rate creeps over 6 once more
drops it short, and thumped away to cow corner. Poor ball and Kohli is too good not to latch on to it
quick single
Iyer gets his captain back on strike
opens the face and guides it to long-off
defended
bit of turn, and Iyer blocks
drives to extra cover, who collects sharply
flick of the wrist to midwicket
back of a length, defended. It's gone to Warner, so they decide against risking a single
excellent shot. Rocks back and cuts it to cover point. Iyer has done very well here. Rotating the strike and pouncing on to bad ball
deflected to short third man
driven to cover, sharp work prevents the run. Here's Debayan to see you, and maybe India, though
length, around off, driven towards point
off the edge, and flies through the vacant point region! Tries to close the face of the bat on a length ball, and it flies off the outside edge
length, around off, and he taps it with the tide towards point
length, and he runs it down towards short fine leg
length, down the leg side. Tickled around the corner, and wants a single to square leg. Turned down by Kohli
length, driven to cover

length, he walks across and looks to flick this. Goes down leg side, and it has been called a wide. Australia choose to review this, but they are told they don't have enough time for this. Seemed to sound like thigh pad, or perhaps even the bat. Looks like thigh pad
length, flicked towards short mid-wicket
length, wide of off, and he drives this towards deep point
short, across him from over the wicket, and he plays it down towards point
length, and he presses forward and picks up a single to mid-off. This went slowly to him, played as it was with soft hands, so he is safely home even with a direct hit at the non-striker's end
full ball, around off, and he can drive this through the cover-point region. Starc has been quite poor with his direction today, and the Indians have made him pay for that each time
short, angles across him. He looks to tap this to square leg, and sets off. Kohli sends him back
back of a length, around off, and he can ease this towards deep point
shorter, and he bashes this towards mid-on. Played from inside the crease, and that ball just seamed a touch and foxed him
short ball, and he miscues an attempted pull. Doesn't get a lot of bat on it, and it drops short of deep backward square leg. Lucky Iyer!
short, and he backs away and looks to cut this past point. Gets under the ball, and misses out
fuller ball, and he backs away and smacks this inside out. Good shot by Iyer. Pre-empted the change in length from Hazlewood!

backs away and slashes this, one bounce into the deep point fence. Top shot again from Iyer. Kohli encouraged him throughout to play his shots, and Iyer met fire with fire on each occasion. India inch ever closer...
short of a length, and swung around between long-on and deep mid-wicket. Top shot!
short again, outside off, and he has eased this into the deep backward point region. Hares through for the second
wrong 'un, turns in from outside off, and he takes the bottom hand off to run this down towards fine leg
length, and he goes back to defend after covering the turn across him
length, presses forward to defend this
length, goes back and punches this towards deep point

length, around leg, and he plays it past short mid-wicket. Finch parries this away towards long-on, and Kohli runs this hard to hustle through for the second! Applauded by Iyer, as the fifty of the partnership comes up
short, and he pushes this towards deep point
short ball, outside off, jagging back in. He looks to thwack this back, but under-edges this towards point
short, and slightly slower than he anticipates. Gets down on his knee, and then guides it towards deep square leg with the periscope. Smiles all around...
short, angles across him, and Iyer swats this over deep mid-wicket. Big six! An exclamation mark over this chase by India, in some ways
backs away, and swats a fuller ball towards extra cover. One bounce, and into the fence
fuller, down the leg side, and he whips this towards fine leg
length, around off, and he drives this towards the sweeper at cover-point
short, and he dismisses this over mid-wicket. Nobody back at the fence, and that's four closer to that hundred!
yorker, and he digs it out towards deep mid-on

he's gone through him! Full ball, and Kohli shuffles across and tries a swipe towards mid-wicket. Misses out on contact, and the ball just kisses the pads and then smashes into the stumps. Chinnaswamy rises as one to applaud this innings. It would seem he has done enough to take India through to yet another ODI chase, though
full ball, just outside off, and he drives this to cover

ooh, a one-handed six on the off side! This is one memorable shellacking that Iyer is handing out to Starc. It's four, in fact, as that one-handed inside out drive lands just short of the extra cover fence
fuller length, and he drives this towards mid-on
length, angles in, and he drives this handsomely down the wicket. Finch dives away at mid-on and stops it
length, and he presses into a cover drive. Takes it to the right of the deep point fieldsman, and allows for two to be picked up quite easily
fuller ball, around off, and he drives that towards the bowler
length, flicked away towards mid-wicket, but stopped by Turner inside the circle, diving low to his right
fuller ball, and Pandey drops this straight back down the wicket. Top shot from him!
length, and he goes back and defends towards mid-wicket
short, but squirted down the leg side. Left alone by Pandey
winning runs in style! Fuller ball, straight at Pandey, and he smacks this back past the bowler. Emphatic chase from India, and they wrap up the series 2-1.
